analysis.key_quote: I strongly object to the proposed Schedule F regulation. Reclassifying NIH grantmaking roles as 'policymaking positions' subject to political appointment risks severely damaging the integrity of federal scientific research funding, one of America's most impressive areas of achievement.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed Schedule F regulation, highlighting concerns about politicization and its negative impact on scientific integrity and merit-based decision-making in federal research funding.
